WorkItem.Description:
I’m getting a problem with the DatePicker. Although the rest of the DatePicker renders correctly, the month name is squashed so you only see half of the characters. See screenshot
 
I'm using the following release: WPF Toolkit June 2009 (Version 3.5.40619.1) (3.5.40619.1)
WorkItem.Summary: Month Name drawing problem with DatePicker

Comments.Message:
I also get exactly this problem [http://wpf.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=11484].

I'm surprised nobody else has commented as it's pretty annoying.

If it's of help, I have identified what causes this problem and the corrected file file is as attached.

It was line 191 of the WPFToolkit/DatePicker/Themes/Generic.xaml resource file for the date picker calendar item.  The Margin="1,4,1,9" is set for the Header button.  I changed to Margin="1,4,1,4" and it allows display of the January 2009 string.  I also changed the margin of the two arrow buttons to align with the header here the margins were.

Hope that helps

Indeed there are some other issues:

*Some long month names don't display correctly.
*Month, Decade and Year selection boxes overlap the header.

Second file fixes these issues too.

Tested XP, 7, and English text.
